html:
{%- set appraisers = [] -%} 
{% set contact_doc = frappe.get_doc("Contact", doc.customers_name) %}
                                                                            
                                                                             F:{{doc.old_pawn_ticket}}
                                                                           
                                                                   {{ doc.get_formatted("maturity_date") }}
                            {{ doc.get_formatted("inventory_tracking_no") }}
                      {{ doc.get_formatted("date_loan_granted") }}                                 {{ doc.get_formatted("expiry_date") }}
                  {{ doc.customers_full_name }}      
                  {{ frappe.db.get_value("Address",doc.customers_tracking_no+"-Permanent","address_line1") }},{{ frappe.db.get_value("Address",doc.customers_tracking_no+"-Permanent","city") }}
   {% for row in contact_doc.phone_nos %}{% set phone = row.phone %}                     {{phone}}{% endfor %}                              {{ doc.desired_principal }}
           Seven           7
                                                                                        
    {%- for row in doc.non_jewelry_items -%}
    {% set av = row.suggested_appraisal_value %}
                                                                             {{ av }}
    {%- endfor -%}      
    {%- set desc = [] -%}{%- for row in doc.non_jewelry_items -%}{%-set nj_item = frappe.get_doc("Non Jewelry Items",row.item_no)-%}{%- if desc.append("1 "+row.brand+", "+row.model+", "+row.model_number+", "+nj_item.ram+"/"+nj_item.internal_memory+" IM") -%} {%- endif -%}
    {%- set acces = [] -%}
    {%- if frappe.db.get_value("Non Jewelry Items",row.item_no,"main_appraiser_name") is none-%} {%- else -%} {%- set mappraiser = frappe.db.get_value("Non Jewelry Items",row.item_no,"main_appraiser_name") -%} {%- endif -%}
    {%- if frappe.db.get_value("Non Jewelry Items",row.item_no,"charger") == 1 -%} {%- if acces.append("w/ charger") -%}{%- endif -%} {%- else -%} {%- if acces.append("no charger") -%}{%- endif -%}{%- endif -%}
    {%- if frappe.db.get_value("Non Jewelry Items",row.item_no,"case") == 1 -%} {%- if acces.append("w/ case") -%}{%- endif -%} {%- else -%} {%- if acces.append("no case") -%}{%- endif -%}{%- endif -%}
    {%- if frappe.db.get_value("Non Jewelry Items",row.item_no,"sim_card") == 1 -%} {%- if acces.append("w/ sim") -%}{%- endif -%} {%- else -%} {%- if acces.append("no sim") -%}{%- endif -%}{%- endif -%}
    {%- if frappe.db.get_value("Non Jewelry Items",row.item_no,"sd_card") == 1 -%} {%- if acces.append("w/ sd card") -%}{%- endif -%} {%- else -%} {%- if acces.append("no sd card") -%}{%- endif -%}{%- endif -%}
    {%- if desc.append(acces|join(", ")) -%}{%- endif -%}
    {%- if (frappe.db.get_value("Non Jewelry Items",row.item_no,"comments") is none) -%}{%- else -%}{%- if desc.append(frappe.db.get_value("Non Jewelry Items",row.item_no,"comments")) -%}{%- endif -%} {%- endif -%}
    {%- set acces = [] -%} 
    {%- if frappe.db.get_value("Non Jewelry Items",row.item_no,"box") == 1 -%} {%- if acces.append("w/ box") -%}{%- endif -%} {%- endif -%}
    {%- if frappe.db.get_value("Non Jewelry Items",row.item_no,"earphones") == 1 -%} {%- if acces.append("w/ earphones") -%}{%- endif -%} {%- endif -%}
    {%- if frappe.db.get_value("Non Jewelry Items",row.item_no,"pin") == 1 -%} {%- if acces.append("w/ pin") -%}{%- endif -%} {%- endif -%}
    {%- if frappe.db.get_value("Non Jewelry Items",row.item_no,"bag") == 1 -%} {%- if acces.append("w/ bag") -%}{%- endif -%} {%- endif -%}
    {%- if desc.append(acces|join(", ")) -%}{%- endif -%}
    {%- if appraisers|length == 0 -%} {%- if appraisers.append(mappraiser|string) -%} {%- endif -%} {%- endif -%}
    {%- endfor -%}
                
{{desc|join(" ")}}
            
                   {{ doc.desired_principal }}
                   {{ doc.interest }}
              
                   {{ doc.net_proceeds }}{% if (doc.old_pawn_ticket is none) %} 
        {{appraisers|join('')}} {% else %} {% endif %}
            
   {%- set id = [] -%}{%- for row in contact_doc.id_type -%}{% if id.append(row.id_type) %}{% endif %}
   {% endfor %}
                                {{id|join(",")|truncate(35,true)}}
name: NCB-NJ ( GTC )
